text: Slate gray is a gray color with a little bit of azure blue in it. It is the usual color of the material slate. The first recorded use of slate gray as a color name in English was in 1705.Maerz and Paul A Dictionary of Color New York:1930 McGraw-Hill Page 204; Color Sample of Slate Gray: Page 51 Plate 14 Color Sample A2 == Tones of slate gray color comparison chart == Name Color HEX Code Red Green Blue Hue Sat Lum Light Slate Gray (web color) #778899 119 136 153 210° 14% 53% Slate gray (web color) #708090 112 128 144 210° 13% 50% Dark Slate Gray (web color) #2F4F4F 47 79 79 180° 25% 25% ==Related pages== * List of colors ==References==
title: Slate gray
